email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to offer you a freight rate for the shipment of steel coils from Shanghai to Long Beach.

Details:
- Commodity: Steel Coils
- Quantity: 12,000 MT
- Load Port: Shanghai
- Discharge Port: Long Beach
- Incoterm: CFR
- Vessel: PACIFIC STAR
- Freight Rate: USD 85/MT
- Laycan: 25-30 March 2023

Please let us know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Ocean Cargo Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Can you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, what is the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Emily Harris
Steelworks Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

PACIFIC STAR has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 250m. The demurrage rate is USD 6,000 per day, pro rata.

Let me know if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thanks for the additional info. We are looking for a rate closer to USD 80/MT. Can you adjust the freight rate accordingly?

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

We can meet you halfway at USD 82/MT. This is our best offer.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

USD 82/MT is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Booking confirmed. Recap attached.

Commodity: Steel Coils
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Shanghai
Discharge Port: Long Beach
Incoterm: CFR
Vessel: PACIFIC STAR
Freight Rate: USD 82/MT
Laycan: 25-30 March 2023
Demurrage: USD 6,000/day pro rata.

Best regards,
Lucas
